attributes.action: Boycott upcoming census if Brexit is not delivered
attributes.background:
Because of the fiasco of Parliament delaying Brexit countless times, very much to the annoyance the population.
I want the British people to show their disgust in politicians by refusing to take part in the upcoming Census.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
